CustomField.formula: IF(isReportable_Text__c = 'Invalid', 0, IF(Existing_Service__c = True, 0, IF(ISPICKVAL(Billing_Frequency__c,'Annually'), ((New_Sales_Price__c* New_Quantity__c)/12)*Contract_Term__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Billing_Frequency__c ,'Quarterly'),((New_Sales_Price__c* New_Quantity__c)/3)*Contract_Term__c, (New_Sales_Price__c* New_Quantity__c)*Contract_Term__c ))))
CustomField.label: Total Product Revenue (Prior 1/1/17)
